title: Compania de Minas Buenaventura (BVN) in Focus: Stock Up 6.7% - Tale of the Tape
text:
Compania de Minas Buenaventura S.A.A (BVN) was a big mover last session, as the company saw its shares rise around 7% on the day. The move came on solid volume too with far more shares changing hands than in a normal session. This reverses the recent trend for the company as the stock is now down 22.5% in the past one-month time frame. 
The company has seen one positive revision in the past one month, while its Zacks Consensus Estimate hasnâ€™t been in trend over the same time frame. 
Compania de Minas Buenaventura currently carries a Zacks Rank #3 (Hold), while its Earnings ESP is 0.00%. 
A better-ranked stock in the same industry is Silver   (SSRI), sporting a Zacks Rank #1 (Strong Buy).
